snippet.title: Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Creation | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Currently in development by Edelweiss, developers of the smash-hit indie action-platformer and rice-farming sim Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin, this title is the first entry in an expanding Sakuna franchise. The game will tell a spin-off story focused on the brilliant Princess Kokorowa, Sakuna’s close friend, who is a high-ranking goddess presiding over wheels and inventions from her heavenly home.

More information about Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Creation will be announced at a later date.
